meanings.definition: To tuck (a garment) into trousers or a skirt.
meanings.sent1: She was blousing her shirt neatly into her pants.
meanings.sent2: He always blouses his uniform to look sharp.
meanings.sent3: The magician bloused his cape into his hat, making it disappear!
meanings.sent4: The clouds blousing the sky with darkness before the storm.
meanings.sent5: The dancer blousing her dress with grace and elegance on stage.

meanings.definition: A style of clothing that is loose and gathered at the waist or cuffs.
meanings.sent1: Her favorite top had a beautiful blousing effect at the waist.
meanings.sent2: The blousing on the sleeves of the dress added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The blousing on the jacket made it look like a fancy balloon!
meanings.sent4: The blousing of the curtains gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent5: The blousing on the blouse made it stand out among the others.
